pr_title: Minor cleanups to encapsulate ES-specifics in storage module.

timeline.message: Removing unused method, moving `IndexHelper` to ES module.
Moving remaining usage of `SortOrder` to storage module.
Moving remaining usage of `SortOrder` to storage module.

timeline.bodyText: How about SortOrderMapper to make it sound less pompous? :)
timeline.author: alex-konn

replies.bodyText: You are underestimating the very complicated and demanding job of looking up the corresponding sort order! :)
replies.author: dennisoelkers

timeline.message: Renaming `SortOrderFactory` to `SortOrderMapper` (it is actually mapping, not creating).
